thread.title: Dover Picks CEO of Agricultural- Equipment Maker CNH as New Leader

author: Austen Hufford
title: Dover Picks CEO of Agricultural- Equipment Maker CNH as New Leader
text:
Industrial-equipment maker Dover Corp. said its chief executive is retiring, and that the CEO of CNH Industrial NV is taking his place.
Chief Executive Robert Livingston, who has led Dover for nine years, is retiring at the end of April, Dover said Tuesday. The company said Richard Tobin, who has served as a director since August 2016 and as CEO of tractor maker CNH, will take over as president and CEO.
